name: The Guest
description:
Important note:

This game focuses on exploration and gradually builds tension to provide a deeper experience. The story takes place inside a house where there is an evil entity that will try to prevent you from getting out alive.

The Guest is a first-person psychological horror game.

Environment

Immerse yourself in this horror experience and feel firsthand the terror of being alone with an entity that is stalking you for being in the wrong place.
The game takes place in a simple and familiar environment that little by little will become your worst nightmare. Move around the house, without neglecting your back, it may be that something is stalking you.

The theme of the game

This game takes place in a small, apparently abandoned house, where our protagonist has had to take refuge from the terrible storm outside. What he doesn't know is that he has entered the wrong house.

Developer Comment:
The supernatural entity in this game may not harm you physically, but they may harm your psychology. It is our recommendation for people who are afraid of the dark, have heart problems, and are afraid of being alone. Play with caution.
